page.title: 07HOUSES IN ETWALL
page.content: In Etwall there are lots of different types of houses. Some of them are council houses, some are very old houses and there are also houses which are quite modern. There is an old house on the corner of Sandypits Lane which was built in 1879. There are also houses which have just been built these are for the old people to live in. There are still some houses being built at the bottom of Belfield Road. There are also quite a few council houses on Belfield Road. These are also going to be demolished. The other type of house is a house which is not very old. In my kitchen is a microwave, a cooker, a cupboard, a heater, a radiator. a spin drier and a washing machine. This is an average kitchen at the moment.
